sorcer.util.rio

Class OpStringStrLoader

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class OpStringStrLoader
extends org.rioproject.impl.opstring.OpStringLoader
    Extend Rio OpStringLoader with parsing groovy operational string from String.

    Author:
    Rafał Krupiński

    • Method Detail

      • parseOperationalString

        public OperationalString[] parseOperationalString(String groovyOpString)
                                           throws Exception
        Create temporary file, call the parser with that file as an argument, and, unless there was an exception, delete the file.
        Parameters:
        groovyOpString - operational string as String
        Returns:
        parsed contents of the operational string
        Throws:
        Exception - any exception from Rio parser
        IOException - on error on creating or writing the temp file.
